name: Software Licenses
rule: If an invoice is related to software licenses or software purchases

name: Hardware Equipment
rule: If an invoice contains computer hardware like laptops or desktop computers

name: Office Furniture
rule: If an invoice is for office furniture such as chairs desks or sofas

name: Office Supplies
rule: If an invoice is for general office supplies like paper or pens

name: High Value Invoices
rule: If an invoice total is above $5000 regardless of category

name: Low Value Invoices
rule: If an invoice total is below $1000 for quick processing
